original_text: And on the second visit Joseph made himself known to his brothers, and Joseph's family became known to Pharaoh.
korean_text: 또 재차 보내매 요셉이 자기 형제들에게 알려지게 되고 또 요셉의 친족이 바로에게 드러나게 되니라

sentences.original_text: Joseph made himself known to his brothers
and Joseph's family became known to Pharaoh
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 요셉의 가족이 바로에게 알려지게 되었습니다
